EmailTemplate.subject: The Guangzhou Football Academy -- Happy Feet Soccer School
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please note that the email address that was given with regards to the Happy Feet Soccer School was incorrect.
If you would like to register your child for the June football programme please send the registration form to;
enquiry@hkf-academy.com
Apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused.
Kind Regards,
Miss Kathy Head of Lower School The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Member of The British Schools Foundation- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
